ing: 1/2 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix
des: "This simple tasty dip is made elegant with the subtle flavor of leeks. Serve it with your favorite raw vegetables."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together dry onion soup mix, dry leek soup mix, dried dill weed, mayonnaise and sour cream. Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
